screen:
-= Info about application 'ChannelRedirect' =-
[Synopsis] Redirects given channel to a dialplan target.
[Description] ChannelRedirect(channel,[[context,]extension,]priority) Sends the specified channel to the specified extension priority This application sets the following channel variables upon completion: CHANNELREDIRECT_STATUS - Are set to the result of the redirection either NOCHANNEL or SUCCESS
